original_text:
And the remaining trees of his forests will be so few
    that a child could write them down.
korean_text: 그의 숲에 남은 나무의 수가 희소하여 아이라도 능히 계수할 수 있으리라

sentences.original_text: And the remaining trees of his forests will be so few
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 숲에 남은 나무들은 너무나 적어서

sentences.original_text: that a child could write them down
